wikipedia_page.main: Sir Edward Temperley Gourley  (8 June 1826 – 15 April 1902) was a coal fitter, shipowner and politician born in Sunderland, England. He was knighted for his political work.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1885 United Kingdom general election

response: * Cyril Edward Gourley (1893-1982), English recipient of the Victoria Cross
